David Beckham Intimately Yours Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2000

Luminous and effervescent this luxury scent envelops your being and shares your most cherished secrets. Shrouded in a beguiling mystery the enigmatic woman who wears David Beckham Intimately Yours sparkles in a brilliant hue of empowering confidence. Created for the iconic brand of David Beckham this Eau de Toilette subtly teases you with a whiff of decadence.

The top note opens with a fragrant basket of floral notes of freesia ripe pear and sweet hints of bergamot. Moving into the heart note you can experience an enriching aroma of fresh orange blossom light notes of lily along with seductive hints of frangipani flower. The base note dries down with powdery and fragrant hints of orris root distinct hints of rich sandalwood and the heavy scent of vetiver. Make a lasting impression at your evening party by donning this delightful oriental floral fragrance. This sensuous perfume is encased in a solid glass vial in the shape of a cube with an elegant square top that radiates a honeyed glow. The aromatic perfume that gently floats within this transparent structure glimmers like liquid gold adding to its opulent air. Intimately Yours is an ebullient perfume that tingles your senses and celebrates your hearts desire.

David Beckham Signature Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.1925

Sensual and resplendent David Beckham Signature For Her strikes a balance between child-like innocence and womanly poise. This luxury scent celebrates the multiple facets of your personality. Created by Sylvie Fischer this Eau de Toilette is another feather in the cap of the extremely popular brand of David Beckham.

Delicately weaving together green and flowery hints of anise with the delicious scent of apple make up the top note. This trails into the heart that is redolent with fragrant orchid sweet hints of heliotrope along with rich vanilla. Earthy patchouli distinct and soothing musk along with smoky hints of amber bring you the lasting base note. The Chypre floral scent envelops you in a warming and exotic cloud that is ideal for any time of the day. This scent comes encased in a glass flacon that radiates a minimalist and sophisticated appeal with its rectangular frame and cube-shaped silver top. Violet flowers diagonally dance across the edge of the flacon as the lavender tinted perfume radiates through the crystal clear glass. A spritz of David Beckham Signature and the scintillating woman is ready to conquer the world.

David Beckham Intimately Eau de Toilette - 75 ml (For Women) Price: Rs.2070

Fresh soft and gloriously feminine this luxury scent makes the charming woman more comfortable in her own skin. The delicate aroma of David Beckham Intimately envelops her in a soothing aura. Introduced in in 2006 this Eau de Toilette is created for the esteemed brand of David Beckham.

A sensuous top note cuddles together fresh and heavy orange blossom sweet bergamot with intense hints of rose and light notes of lotus. Passing into the heart of the fragrance the marriage of positively sublime tuberose with green and citrusy casablanca lily charms you. The base note dries down with creamy vanilla combined with rich sandalwood and soothing yet heavy notes of musk. This fresh floral woody fragrance is sure to send you into a trance with a mere whiff. A beguiling fragrance floats elegantly within the glass flacon in the shape of a cube with a transparent square top. Within this minimalist flacon the sensuous mauve coloured perfume glimmers through and captivates the wearer. Share your private moments with someone special and adorn the moment with this lovely scent.
